Onderwerp: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba designs?


Yes, the Natsuo Taikan by Miyake Teruyoshi.  8 volumes and something
over 2,400 pages.  I was tempted, but didn't buy.

Jim


  I might add to this that Kano Natsuo was also a very original designer
and
  the set of books on him (way expensive) that was done by the guys at
the
  fittings museum (I think) included at least one entire volume on his
  paintings and designs. A bit too specialized for me, but very
interesting to
  see how he worked up from paper to metal.



  Gordon
